Summary: Strange lights combined with eachother then disappeared
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Malone
There were no other sightings in Malone on or around January 18th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsAbove the fairgrounds in Malone I witnessed a set of glowing lights that seemed to combine into 1 large light very quickly then the lights then went out instantly. Nothing further was seen.
